meanings.sent1: I need to uninstall this game from my computer.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to uninstall any unnecessary programs to free up space.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally uninstalled the wrong software, oops!
meanings.sent4: She uninstalled the app like it was a pesky bug on her computer.
meanings.sent5: The technician showed me how to uninstall the program step by step.

meanings.definition: To delete or remove a program or application from a device.
meanings.sent1: My phone is running out of storage, so I have to uninstall some apps.
meanings.sent2: It's important to uninstall old apps to keep your device running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: I had to uninstall the game because it kept crashing my phone.
meanings.sent4: She uninstalled the app as if it were clutter in her digital space.
meanings.sent5: Remember to uninstall any unused apps to optimize your device's performance.
